chara.textHome:
My name is Hayate Yagami,
I work as a mage!

I'm good at all types of magic
...and cooking!
I'd be happy to make something for you!
This is a whole new Hayate Yagami!

Now I can support everyone
like never before!
My specialty is large-scale magic.

Rather than single out a target, leave it to
me to take out a broad area with a bang!

For anything else...
I will fuse and do my best!
Thank you so much for the help.

Tuning for the Tome of the Night Sky
is complete!
Whoa, I feel power welling up in my chest!

I treasure the Tome of the Night Sky
more than anything.

I will do what I can to be
a more worthy master!

Their paths may be slightly different,
but everyone who fights is the same.

They all want to live happily without
hurting anyone...

Reinforce gave me my power so
I could make that tomorrow a reality.
I must hone it further still!

Looks like we ran into each other
again today! So, how are you?
G'morning.
Let's seize the day, together!
Ah, almost noon.

I made some lunch. 
You're welcome to join me if you like!
I'm Hayate Yagami,

I work for the Time Space
Administration Bureau.
It's nice to meet you!
The sun is already starting to set.

Work is important,
but don't forget about dinner.
It's pretty late.

If you're sleepy,
make sure to get to bed, all right?
Colds are no laughing matter.
Hm? What's up?

If you're free, I'd be happy to
spend some time with you.
I can deploy at any time.
Stay calm, and let's get to work!
Mind if we spar a little?

I'd like to practice that formation
we just learned.
Hm? Saying hello?
Well, I suppose we can chat for a while!

This outfit?
It's called Knight Armor,
something I wear into battle.
I just love the shape of my hat!

I wield Belkan magic,
an older style with very few users.

I have Rein and the Tome of the Night Sky
to thank for being able to use it so well.

Nanoha and Fate saved my life,
they are my precious friends.

We're all the same age,
but I'm the shortest...
My accent? Is it bothering you?
That's how everyone speaks where I'm from.

My Devices are the Tome of the Night Sky
and Schwertkreuz. I treasure them both.

With them at my side, I'll do everything
I can to assist everyone as a
Magical Girl again today.
I used to be all alone.

That's why I can't ignore those
suffering the same plight.

This may be asking too much,
but would you give me a hand?

The one who has always watched
over me, my precious savior.

Her name and essence
now belong to Reinforce Zwei.
I have to do right by her as a master.

I couldn't walk when I was young,
so I was often carried.
I still enjoy being held...
Not that I'm asking you to do that.
All right then, time to eliminate our target!
It all worked out somehow...
Let's keep it up for the next battle!
Glad we all made it out okay!
We won!

Has my practice paid off?
Wonderful!

Perhaps now I can be a bit more
proud to be the Mistress of the
Tome of the Night Sky.

All paths begin with a single step.
Slow down and take the first one with me.

I have tremendous magical power,
but struggle with precision and dexterity.
I must find a way to cover for that.
